java/liquibase/database/template/ArgPreparedStatementSetter.java

00001 package liquibase.database.template;
00002 
00003 import java.sql.PreparedStatement;
00004 import java.sql.SQLException;
00005 
00012 class ArgPreparedStatementSetter implements PreparedStatementSetter {
00013 
00014     private final Object[] args;
00015 
00016 
00022     public ArgPreparedStatementSetter(Object[] args) {
00023         this.args = args;
00024     }
00025 
00026 
00027     public void setValues(PreparedStatement ps) throws SQLException {
00028         if (this.args != null) {
00029             for (int i = 0; i < this.args.length; i++) {
00030                 Object arg = this.args[i];
00031                 if (arg instanceof SqlParameterValue) {
00032                     SqlParameterValue paramValue = (SqlParameterValue) arg;
00033                     StatementCreatorUtils.setParameterValue(ps, i + 1, paramValue, paramValue.getValue());
00034                 } else {
00035                     StatementCreatorUtils.setParameterValue(ps, i + 1, SqlTypeValue.TYPE_UNKNOWN, arg);
00036                 }
00037             }
00038         }
00039     }
00040 
00041 
00042 }
